venue.name: Best Western Executive Court Inn & Conf. Ctr

item.description:
Meetup Friday Feb 4! This month we are so lucky to have Chef Frank Giglio with us to work some of his magic!

Blender Alchemy!

Join Chef Frank Giglio as he whips up some of his favorite meals in a blender. Learn how you can create immune boosting sweet and savory meals by adding super herbs and spices. Frank will demonstrate his favorite blender recipes with the additions of his newest line of Frank's Finest, LLC, herb and spice blends. Samples and recipes will be given out to all who attend. Frank is am amazing chef. It is going to be a great night!

Potluck. Please bring a raw organic dish enough for 6-8 people. If you are new and not sure what to bring a salad...fruit or veggie is always good.

If you are short on time I can make you a meal for $15.

I can't wait to see everyone. Happy New Year! 2011 is going to be a great year.


Adults: $10
Children: Always free!
item.why: it is going to be a great time ....as it always is :)

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Feb 4 Meetup!!
